snippet: The Web magazine will publish an expanded look at books on the first Saturday of each month, as stand-alone book review sections in newspapers have dwindled.
abstract: Web magazine Slate will publish an expanded look at books on the first Saturday of each month, as stand-alone book review sections in newspapers have dwindled; section will nearly triple the number of book-related articles that Slate publishes.
lead_paragraph: The Web magazine will publish an expanded look at books on the first Saturday of each month, as stand-alone book review sections in newspapers have dwindled.

headline.seo: Slate to Begin a Monthly Review of Books
headline.main: Slate to Begin a Monthly Review of Books
headline.print_headline: Slate to Begin a Monthly Review of Books
